name: Melting Ice
description:
Use only your Mouse!

The mouse cursor fears the penguins then you can heandle there

the blue ones are males the pink are females if they touch each other the female goes pregnant ( red) and will lay an egg that will give you a brand new penguin.

click on the boxes and barrels in the sea to destroy them or they will destroy your piece of ice.

care there is some dangers hide near this place !!!!

Enjoy and leave us a comment, and tell us your best score!

Crazy collibri crew !

Mac and web version will be available soon ( some issues appears while exporting)
